name: Mainframe (Taylor Morris)
description:
Mainframe is a game where a lone hacker races against time to hack the secure server of a sinister megacorp and expose its secrets to the world. Meanwhile, three private security officers work together to capture the rogue hacker and hold onto their bonus checks. Inspired by collaborative world-building board and tile-based games like Carcassonne and Betrayal at House on the Hill, Mainframe is a fast-paced, randomly-generated and highly replayable asymmetrical multiplayer game for two or four players.

Credits:
Programming, Design, Placeholder Art&SFX — Taylor Morris (http://www.taylormorrisgames.com)
Art, Design — Brian Wolf (http://briandanielwolf.daportfolio.com/)
Programming, Design — Nick Cummings (http://www.nickcummings.com)
Music, Sound Design — Nathan Franks
